headline: Should Investors Reassess Allstate’s Valuation After Its Strong Multi Year Share Price Rally?
summary: How Has Allstate's Share Price Been Performing? Allstate's share price has delivered robust returns over multiple time frames, which is an important backdrop before digging into valuation. Investors have seen the stock rise 8.9% year to date and 12.6% over the past year, while the 3 year and 5 year gains stand at 66.6% and 123.1% respectively. While there was a modest 0.1% dip over the last 30 days, the stock still climbed 3.9% in just the past week, suggesting sentiment remains constructive...

headline: November 2025 Monthly Release
summary: NORTHBROOK, Ill., December 18, 2025--The Allstate Corporation (NYSE: ALL) today announced estimated catastrophe losses for the month of November of $46 million or $36 million, after-tax. Total catastrophe losses for October and November were $129 million or $101 million, after-tax.
